articles.description: Williams, who turns 41 later this month, bowed out of the US Open in the third round - having confirmed before the tournament that it would be her last.
articles.content:
LeBron James sent a heartfelt message to Serena Williams following the final match of the American's glittering tennis career. 
Williams, who turns 41 later this month, bowed out of the US Open in t… [+3420 chars]
